Text: Please keep seeding, guys! I can't seed to everyone all the time, I have bandwidth caps :/
It works perfectly, thanks! I have to use VLC to play it in English, because Windows Media Player plays it in Japanese without any subtitles.
I don't know why that happens; I definitely set English as the first audio track. Maybe you should set English as your preferred audio language in your codec settings?
I should note that Viz Media licensed this movie about 2 weeks after I uploaded it, and it'll be released on North American (Region 1) DVD on November 8, 2011. Please buy it if you like it!

Excellent Quality Rip! A/10 V/10. English Subtitles/10.

Dual Audio English & Japanese.

tehnores Gets First +1 of Approval!
